entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • JIT: IEnumerable<string>isinst String[] should be inlined #75815
    8.0.0
  • [v7.0.0-rc.1.22426.10] Extremely slow build of non-portable runtime on `armv7` #75811
  • [Android] NetworkInterface.GetAllNetworkInterfaces failed with NetworkInformationException (message: Success) #75809
  • System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.AttRegexTests test fails in CI #75808
  • [NativeAOT] Unnecessary lookup in TrailingEpilogueInstructionsCount #75807

PullRequests

Created

  • Delete unused code #75814
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Multi-targeting logic in Source Generators in NuGet packages doesn't work transitively #75813
    Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Modernize XmlUTF8TextWriter with u8/inline out's. #75812
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • No need to try hijack/suspend GC threads #75810
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • remove explicit LangVersion from a few projects #75806
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Delete some unused includes and files #75805
    area-Meta
  • JIT: extend RBO partial inference to unsigned relops #75804
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Simplify windows version detection in vm #75254
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Make conservative stack reporting configurable. #75803
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] QueryPerformanceCounter in Pal should use CLOCK_MONOTONIC #75708
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • Allocate RuntimeType objects on Frozen Object Heap #75573
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0-rc2] Do not request type layout for RuntimeDetermined types #75789
    Servicing-consider, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Set names to runtime internal threads #75113
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Enable CI for macOS x64/arm64 #75421
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [Mono]Disable failing intrinsics tests for llvmaot CI lane, due to disabling LLVM JIT #75768
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [wasm] hide interop delegates from intellisense #75800
    arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Audit MemoryExtensions.IndexOf variants #75754
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Fix some incorrect SpecialFolder entries for Unix #68610
    area-System.Runtime, breaking-change, os-linux, os-mac-os-x, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • Implement DivRem intrinsic for X86 #66551
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Fix mono provision-wasm on Linux ARM64 #75591
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • Add debugger display for huge BigInteger #75796
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-18
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Test comment references wrong compiler error code #63898

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge main to features/lambda-default-parameters #64112
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Merged

  • fixed a comment to clarify correct error code in the test. fixes #63898 #63901
    Area-Compilers, Test, Community, Next
  • Use patterns to simplify a few checks. #64106
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/CLaSP #64113
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge main to features/CLaSP #64115
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64114
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add ReturnOnly scope #64090
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-18
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • What is the difference between AddHttpClientInstrumentation and AddAspNetCoreInstrumentation #44033

Updated

  • Blazor wasm .NET 6 rc2 unable to use RegisterForJavaScript RootComponents when publishing #38044
  • Kestrel hosted Blazor WASM large file upload problem: really slow. #30243
    Backlog
  • Error when using auth with prerendering after trimming #44007
  • Razor Pages 404 after updating to ASP.NET Core 7 RC1 #44002
  • Blazor @key not working when inside RenderFragment or Repeater like component #44039
  • Blank Blazor WASM app fails to publish with PublishTrimmed set to false on .NET 7 RC1 #44038
  • Schema change limits aspnetcore session state in SQL #44028

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix the name of the maestro-bot user. #44042
    area-infrastructure

Updated

  • source-build: support building aspnetcore using non-portable runtime packages. #43937
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 1997181 #43956
    area-infrastructure
  • Vectorized HttpCharacters #44041
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • StringUtilities with xplat-intrinsics (and a little perf-tuning) #44040
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0-rc2' => 'release/7.0' #44034
    area-infrastructure, area-runtime, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #44022
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Windows] WebView doesn't display url when inside a VerticalStackLayout #10195
  • Tapping on entry field throws an NSInvalidArgumentException running on an iPhone device #10194
  • No support to remove or modify visual focus style #10193
  • Focus events not working in MAC #10192
  • XA1018 Specified AndroidManifest file does not exist after dotnet workload update #10191
  • iOS keyboard "done" button does not call Editor.Completed and does not close the keyboard. #10190
  • DataTrigger stops reacting on value change #10189

Closed

  • Network is not reachable. Please check your connection and try again. #10020

PullRequests

Updated

  • [Essentials] Geolocation foreground listening #9572
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #10178
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Optimistic concurrency exception from stored procedure logs error #29135

Closed

  • Add foreign key to existing property with converter and explicit column name #29050
  • EF 7 RC1 - The binary operator Equal is not defined for the types 'System.Guid' and 'System.Nullable`1[System.Guid]' #29120
  • SqlException: EFCore thinks I am trying to identity insert when I never manually set the primary key. #29040

PullRequests

Created

  • Async fix for "Generate values for PK properties that are also self-referencing FK properties" #29134
    Servicing-consider, 7.0.0-rc2
  • Don't fixup to deleted entities #29133
    Servicing-consider, 7.0.0-rc2

Updated

  • [release/7.0] Scaffolding: Don't scaffold HasColumnOrder #29126
    Servicing-consider, 7.0.0-rc2
  • Templates: Specify a groupIdentity for ef-templates #29118
    Servicing-consider, 7.0.0-rc2
